thread.title: JupiterMLP Adds Industry Veteran Albert Johnson to Executive Leadership Team

author: cnbc.com
title: JupiterMLP Adds Industry Veteran Albert Johnson to Executive Leadership Team

organizations.name: business development for navigator energy services

text:
DALLAS--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- JupiterMLP, LLC (“Jupiter”), a privately held midstream company that provides Permian-Delaware Basin producers and gas plants with crude oil and plant condensate logistics and offtake solutions , today announced that Albert Johnson has joined the Company’s leadership team as Executive Vice President of Business Development.
This press release features multimedia. View the full release here: https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180406005117/en/
Expected to start up in 4Q 2019, Jupiter's pipeline will have direct connection into Kinder Morgan's Double Eagle and Kinder Morgan Crude and Condensate Pipeline Systems. (Photo: Business Wire)
Formerly the Vice President of Business Development for Navigator Energy Services, Mr. Johnson is an industry veteran with extensive experience in identifying, analyzing and negotiating commercial projects in the energy sector.
In his role as Jupiter’s EVP of Business Development, Johnson will be responsible for driving all strategic business development efforts and asset management activities related to Jupiter’s operations in the Permian Basin. He will be instrumental in driving Jupiter’s business forward with respect to providing crude oil marketing, logistics, and processing solutions to customers.
Prior to joining Navigator, he was the director of business development for Sunoco Logistics Partners LP, where he participated in contract negotiations resulting in pipeline and terminal projects totaling more than $3 billion. Johnson also served on the board of directors of West Texas Gulf Pipe Line Company and the management committee for SunVit Pipeline LLC.
Johnson holds a Bachelor of Arts degree in history from the University of Texas at Austin and a Master of Business Administration degree with a focus on finance from the Jones Graduate School of Business at Rice University.
About JupiterMLP
JupiterMLP is a private company that provides Permian-Delaware Basin producers and gas plants with crude oil and plant condensate logistics and offtake solutions. Jupiter's strategically located terminals in the Permian Basin connect to the Gulf Coast refining markets, with a focus on the Delaware Basin. Jupiter is an active first purchaser of both high and low gravity crude and plant condensate in New Mexico and West Texas. In addition to a 670+ mile dedicated high gravity crude oil pipeline that originates in Orla, Texas with additional inject points and offtake points at Pecos and Three Rivers, the Company is also constructing a crude upgrading, processing and export terminal on approximately 270 acres of land located in the Port of Brownsville, Texas. For more information on Jupiter, visit www.jupitermlp.com .
View source version on businesswire.com : https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180406005117/en/
